name: The Revenge of Archibald Nips
description:
Play as Archibald Nips, a man whose goal is to sneak to the tenth level of a bread factory to destroy the generator. He must spin and use a disguise he found in order to not get caught by the guards.

This game was made for the Unity Course Community Jam with a theme of "spin," although our game is pretty loosely connected to that theme. We're also proud to say that this is the first complete game that the three of us have made.
